lead_paragraph: The Rangers avoided a potentially contentious arbitration hearing by agreeing to terms with forward Marcel Hossa on a one-year contract worth $780,000. The only deal still unsettled is with forward Sean Avery.
snippet: The Rangers avoided a potentially contentious arbitration hearing by agreeing to terms with forward Marcel Hossa on a one-year contract worth $780,000. The only deal still unsettled is with forward Sean Avery.
